item.title: Perplexity reportedly raised $200M at $20B valuation
item.description: The AI-powered search startup's valuation jumped from $18 billion two months earlier.

item.title: Thinking Machines Lab wants to make AI models more consistent
item.description: In a blog post shared Wednesday, Mira Murati's startup offered a rare glimpse into some of work its doing to improve AI models.

item.title: How to turn off autoplay on your social media feeds
item.description: Here's how you can turn off autoplaying videos and GIFs on Facebook, Instagram, X, Twitter, and Threads.

item.title: While US stalls, Australia and Anduril move to put XL undersea vehicle into service
item.description: Anduril has landed a lucrative contract and is bringing its uncrewed undersea vehicle Ghost Shark to Australian waters next year.
